mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_shipping_instruction si JOIN tb_sales_order so ON (si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq) JOIN tb_client c ON (so.client_seq = c.client_seq) WHERE si.shipping_instruction_status IN ('결재 전', '결재 후')
AND #{startDate} <= tb_quotation.quotation_quotation_date
AND #{endDate} >= tb_quotation.quotation_quotation_date
AND so.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{clientName}, '%')
AND si.shipping_instruction_status LIKE #{shippingInstructionStatus}

SELECT si.shipping_instruction_seq, si.shipping_instruction_name, si.shipping_instruction_status, si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date, c.client_name, si.shipping_instruction_total_quantity, si.shipping_instruction_address, u.user_name, si.shipping_instruction_note FROM tb_shipping_instruction si JOIN tb_user u ON (si.user_seq = u.user_seq) JOIN tb_sales_order so ON (si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq) JOIN tb_client c ON (so.client_seq = c.client_seq) WHERE si.shipping_instruction_seq = #{shippingInstructionSeq}

SELECT sii.shipping_instruction_item_seq, sii.item_seq, i.item_image_url, i.item_name, i.item_division, i.item_price, sii.shipping_instruction_item_quantity, sii.shipping_instruction_item_note, (i.item_price * sii.shipping_instruction_item_quantity) AS itemTotalQuantity FROM tb_shipping_instruction_item sii JOIN tb_item i ON sii.item_seq = i.item_seq WHERE sii.shipping_instruction_seq = #{shippingInstructionSeq}
